topic.title: Go Integration
topic.note: Go integration is available on Mingle onsite until v16.1.
topic.p: Mingle integrates with Go, the Continuous Integration and Delivery tool from ThoughtWorks Studios. This allows the users of Go and Mingle to surround their data with additional context, increasing the value of the information therein.

Mingle's Go pipeline status gadget allows the display of the current status of a Go pipeline in a Mingle page or card. This allows users to view current project status across the two products in a single view. To enable this integration, please follow the instructions for configuring the display of Go gadgets within Mingle.
